name: Basic Fertilizer
description: Basic Fertilizer is used on crop plots to enhance the growth of plants. When applied, Crop Yield and Crop Growth Speed is increased by 15% for 1200 seconds. To fertilize a crop plot, equip a fertilizer of your choosing from your hotbar and left click the plot you wish to fertilize.
